original_text:
The Lord has opened his arsenal
    and brought out the weapons of his wrath,
for the Sovereign Lord Almighty has work to do
    in the land of the Babylonians.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 병기창을 열고 분노의 무기를 꺼냄은 주 만군의 여호와께서 갈대아 사람의 땅에 행할 일이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has opened his arsenal
and brought out the weapons of his wrath,
for the Sovereign Lord Almighty has work to do
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 전능하신 주 하나님이 하실 일이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: in the land of the Babylonians.
